tool_description: An API for serving high-quality anime quotes
name: Anime Quotes_v4
title: Anime Quotes

api_list.name: Get a random quote
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://anime-quotes2.p.rapidapi.com/api/random"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "anime-quotes2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
